title: I had thought that there was a North Carolina law prohibiting customers from entering a grocery store unless they had on a shirt and shoes. After going to the Harris Teeter store on Eastwood Road today, I was curious as to why that law is not being upheld. Is there such a law, and, if so, why isn\'t it being enforced? You could do quite a story on the attire( or lack thereof) seen at just that store during the summer.
